             java.lang.String clientId,

        Parameters:
        gNumber - - number of the table
        clientId - - id of the client
        port - - port of the table
        maxPlayers - - number of maximum players allowed
        temp - - if this table is temporary
        minBet - - minimum value of bet allowed
